org.jivesoftware.util.cache

Interface ClusterTask<V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Externalizable, Runnable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddAffiliation, AddMember, AffiliationTask, BroadcastMessageRequest, BroadcastPresenceRequest, CancelSubscriptionTask, ChangeNickname, DestroyRoomRequest, FlushTask, GetAdminConsoleInfoTask, GetBasicStatistics, GetNewMemberRoomsRequest, GetNumberConnectedUsers, GetSessionsCountTask, IsPluginInstalledTask, ModifySubscriptionTask, MUCRoomTask, MUCServicePropertyClusterEventTask, NewSubscriptionTask, NodeChangeTask, NodeTask, NotifyComponentInfo, NotifyComponentRegistered, NotifyComponentUnregistered, OccupantAddedEvent, OccupantLeftEvent, PropertyClusterEventTask, RefreshNodeTask, RemoveNodeTask, RoomAvailableEvent, RoomRemovedEvent, RoomUpdatedEvent, SeniorMemberServicesRequest, ServiceAddedEvent, ServiceRemovedEvent, ServiceUpdatedEvent, SubscriptionTask, UpdateHistoryStrategy, UpdateOccupant, UpdateOccupantRequest, UpdatePresence

    public interface ClusterTask<V>
extends Runnable, Externalizable
    An interface to mix in Externalizable and Runnable, which are both required for sending invokable tasks across a cluster.
